metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23169 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.Description:
A heap-buffer overflow was found in the copyIntoFrameBuffer function ofOpenEXR in versions before 3.0.1. An attacker could use this flaw toexecute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running theapplication compiled against OpenEXR.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr25 - 2.5.7-1
openexr - 2.5.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.7-1').
